alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Southern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 3:29PM EST until January 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of southern Connecticut, northeast New Jersey and southeast New York. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Sub freezing road temperatures will allow snow to accumulate overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Southern Fairfield
